TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataServiceHost extends System.ServiceModel.Web.WebServiceHost

summary.span: 派生自 的 WCF Data Service 类用于实例化数据服务。

span.span: The WCF Data Services class derived from used to instantiate data services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] 不是自治服务器实体。are not autonomous server entities. 相反，该服务是在提供核心服务器网络设施的环境（例如 Windows Communication Foundation （WCF））中托管的组件。Instead, the service is a component hosted in an environment such as the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) that provides core server networking facilities. 具体而言，服务不会绑定到网络套接字并侦听其具象状态传输（REST）入口点的传入请求。Specifically, a service does not bind to and listen on a network socket for incoming requests to its Representational State Transfer (REST) entry points. 宿主将处理与网络的直接交互并支持缓存、可伸缩性和身份验证模块。The host handles direct interactions with the network and support caching, scalability, and authentication modules. [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] 定义一个泛型宿主接口 ，它从特定主机抽象其实现。defines a generic hosting interface that abstracts its implementation from a specific host. 这允许 [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] 在一系列宿主环境中运行。This allows [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] to run in a range of hosting environments. 有关详细信息，请参阅[承载数据服务](/dotnet/framework/data/wcf/hosting-the-data-service-wcf-data-services)。For more information, see [Hosting the Data Service](/dotnet/framework/data/wcf/hosting-the-data-service-wcf-data-services).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type serviceType, class System.Uri[] baseAddresses) cil managed
Public Sub New (serviceType As Type, baseAddresses As Uri())

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] 定义一个泛型宿主接口 ，它从特定主机抽象其实现。defines a generic hosting interface that abstracts its implementation from a specific host. 这允许 [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] 在一系列宿主环境中运行。This allows [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] to run in a range of hosting environments. 此接口不应与 混淆，而是处理服务的注册和激活。This interface should not be confused with , which instead handles registration and activation for the service. 在这种情况下，将使用默认 。A default is used in this case.
